about_the_game:
Lus is a 2.5D platform game with 3D photorealistic scenarios made with Unreal Engine 5.1 and traditionally animated 2D characters. Lus is a fun and engaging game suitable for all ages, which highlights the importance of sustainability and respect for the environment. During the game, the user will help Lus, our hero, clean up the world from evil and save the planet. The story is set in a post-apocalyptic setting that fully immerses the user, making the gaming experience innovative and exhilarating.



Are you ready for a new adventure? "LUS: Last Unit Standing" is the platform game that will take you to
a post-apocalyptic future. Earth is now an uninhabitable place due to the climate crisis and pollution.
Smog, high temperatures, waste, and melting glaciers are just some of the problems present, and your
task will be to restore the planet to its former glory. But don't worry, it's not a boring science lesson!
"LUS: Last Unit Standing" is a fun and engaging game that will entertain you while teaching you the
importance of sustainability and respect for the environment. Your task will be to help the little
protagonist defeat enemies and clean up the world from evil. Come and live a unique and engaging
experience that will make you feel part of the change our planet needs.



Enter the magical world of Lus, where wild nature meets advanced technology. Our team has worked
hard to create a unique animal, combining the grace of a rabbit, the liveliness of a squirrel, and the
intelligence of a fox. The result was amazing: Lus is a small and charming Fennec fox, with long ears and
a soft tail that captivates you at first sight. The colors of her fur recall the four elements of the Earth,
with green representing water, white representing air, earth on her hair, and fire on her hoodie. Lus is a skilled fighter, with an arsenal of abilities that will help you defeat enemies and bosses on every
continent. You can run, jump, glide, kick, and create a myriad of combos. By exploring the map, you can
find collectible items that will provide you with information about Lus's life and waste collection and
recycling. You can also upgrade Lus as you play, her robotic arm becoming stronger and more powerful.
Become the best Lus player and save the world from imminent destruction!

Who doesn't want to travel the world? Start an exciting journey through landscapes inspired by the
Orient, Europe, and more! Thanks to the power of Unreal Engine 5, you can enjoy realistic and detailed
scenarios like never before. What are you waiting for? Jump on Lus's spaceship and start your journey
around the world



If you have any questions or just want to keep up to date with the progress of the game, you can follow us on all our social networks that you find on our website:

Our Team welcomes you to the fantastic world of Lus!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3450, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: A new platform game that combines 2D style with 3D in a post apocalyptic world.
